AddOn.Name: Noblesse Oblige
AddOn.Text:
For one turn/ grants the ability Salamander Shield to all adjacent units.
This effect also applies to the unit's partner. (Usable <COUNT> times.)

AddOn.Name: Boundary of Focused and Unfocused
AddOn.Text:
Switches the Focused and Unfocused modes of all other allied units.
This effect also applies to units that have already acted.
(Usable <COUNT> times.)

AddOn.Name: Boundary of Vanguard and Rearguard
AddOn.Text:
Switches the frontline and backline positions of all other allied units in a team.
This effect also applies to units that have already acted.
(Usable <COUNT> times.)

AddOn.Name: Boundary of Offense and Defense
Boundary of Dreams and Bonds (Original)
AddOn.Text:
For one turn/ all frontline allied units are considered adjacent to each other.
This does not affect Support or Combined unit actions.
(Usable <COUNT> times.)

AddOn.Name: Omikuji Bomb
AddOn.Text:
Modifies damage dealt by a factor ranging from -<VAL1>% to +<VAL2>%.
This effect is randomly set at the beginning of each turn.

AddOn.Name: Black-and-White Judgment (FMW4)
AddOn.Text:
Rounds up damage dealt and Accuracy rate for both units in Eiki's team.
Damage dealt is rounded up to the nearest multiple of 1000,
while Accuracy rate is rounded up to the nearest multiple of 10%.

AddOn.Name: Black-and-White Judgment (OG CB)
AddOn.Text:
For one turn, the unit's damage will be fixed at <VAL1> points. 
Does not work on units with 'Special Resistance'. 
(Usable <COUNT> times.)

AddOn.Name: Mark of the Wind
AddOn.Text:
Consume <VAL1>% Faith to cast Miracle on this unit.
(Usable <COUNT> times.)

AddOn.Name: Youkai Power Spoiler
AddOn.Text:
Replenishes <VAL1> MP when the unit's team defeats an enemy.
Sanae must be in the frontline for this skill to activate.

AddOn.Name: Fixed Stars on Earth
AddOn.Text:
All squares in the <VAL1>-square radius around the unit are set to Day terrain.
The terrain modifier also affects Wriggle's partner.
Does not affect unit and weapon Night Ratings that are at least S.

AddOn.Name: Devil's Contract
AddOn.Text:
Grants a buff that sets a unit's Night Terrain Rating to S,
in exchange for <VAL1>% of their max HP.
(Usable <COUNT> times.)
